long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Browsing History to News is a powerful Chrome extension that scans your browsing history to generate personalized, relevant news summaries for you. By analyzing your search history, the extension extracts the top news topics and provides concise summaries that keep you informed on the latest developments in the fields you're most interested in. Whether it's technology, healthcare, or global events, this extension helps you stay updated based on your own search history.

Key Features:

Instant news summaries based on your browsing history.
Focused on the latest developments
User-friendly design with a newspaper-like feel for easy reading.
Automatically analyzes your search history to provide tailored content.
